text: Gen tte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa anata gata to onaji, tada no ningen ni suginai. Anata gata no kami wa, yuiitsu no kami (arra)dearu koto ga, watashi ni keiji sa reta nodearu. Oyoso daredemo,-nushi to no kaiken o koi negau mono wa, tadashi okonai o shi nasai. Kare no omo o Takashiru baai ni nanihitotsu (doi ni) haichi shite suhai shite wa naranai
